Package cs3318.group17.raytracer.shapes

Class Triangle

java.lang.Object
cs3318.group17.raytracer.shapes.Shape
cs3318.group17.raytracer.shapes.Triangle
public class Triangle extends Shape
Fully describes a Triangle's placement and orientation in a Scene as well as whether a Ray has intersected the Triangle or not.

  • Constructor Details

    • Triangle

      public Triangle(Point p1, Point p2, Point p3)
      Constructs the 3-dimensional triangle which is a subset of the Plane defined by Points p1, p2 and p3.
      Parameters:
      p1 - first corner of the Triangle
      p2 - second corner of the Triangle
      p3 - third corner of the Triangle

  • Method Details

    • intersect

      public RayHit intersect(Ray ray)
      Computes the RayHit of a Ray with the current Triangle. Does so by first computing the RayHit of the Ray with the Plane defined by the current Triangle's 3 points p1, p2, p3 and then checks to see if that intersection point is a part of the set of points contained by the current Triangle.
      Specified by:
      intersect in class Shape
      Parameters:
      ray - the incident Ray on the current Triangle
      Returns:
      the RayHit of ray on the current Triangle or null if there is no intersection
